name: Escape From Lighthouse
description:
Escape from Lighthouse of the vast universe.

You are in a space prison called "Lighthouse" of space.
A human experiment will be conducted.

Escape from Lighthouse as you progress through a growing variety of experiments

Escape from Lighthouse is a game that primarily requires the player's brain.

• Solve puzzles - experience increasingly difficult and varied puzzles

• Organized by chapters - solve the puzzles of the previous chapters again.

• Escape from Lighthouse - solve all the puzzles and escape through the events
